input.sentences: the winter freeze of 2015 crippled the whole world . everything was at a standstill . transportation and trade were gone .
agriculture and livestock were destroyed by the 100 below weather . our food source was gone .
the roads and the communications infrastructure was down .
the government was at a loss . they were running scared . there was no one to lead the people .
without power to keep warm everything was freezing . this was armageddon | the end of the world .
output.sentences: I decide to leave home now that the walkway is cleared
the heavy snow last night still evident on the spring branches of a tree
and as it lays blanketing a hedge overlooking a river with bridge
that leads to the heavily impacted governmental buildings with only the domed building not blanketed
I slowly walk to my Mom's house only to be great by a long flight of stairs I have to shovel snow from.
